message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I really think that's the most I can go for.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $105 is a more reasonable price for this amazing product. It's a unique item, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $95 is the maximum I can go for. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I'm not willing to go above that.

I understand you're trying to be reasonable, Bob! However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $95. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $102, and that's my final offer. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
